entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
